DOC.brief_summary: Nefopam is administered as a preemptive analgesic drug to the patient undergoing breast cancer surgery. It will be evaluated whether postoperative acute and chronic pain can be reduced.
DOC.brief_title: The Preemptive Analgesic Efficacy of Nefopam
DOC.criteria: Patients diagnosed with breast cancer Lumpectomy with axillary lymph node dissection or Lumpectomy with sentinel lymph node biopsy American Society of Anesthesiologists physical status I or II Refusal Seizure Cardiac disease Monoamine oxidase inhibitor user Urologic disease Glucoma Preoperative analgesic drug medication Pregnancy Recurred breast cancer patient
